{{cpp/utility/initializer_list/title|begin}}
{{cpp/utility/initializer_list/navbar}}
{{ddcla|since=c++11|constexpr=c++14|
const T* begin() const noexcept;
}}

Obtains a pointer to the first element in the initializer list.

If the initializer list is empty, the values of {{tt|begin()}} and {{lc|end()}} are unspecified, but will be identical.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
A pointer to the first element in the initializer list

===Complexity===
Constant

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;initializer_list&gt;

int main()
{
    static constexpr auto il = {42, 24};
    static_assert(*il.begin() == 0x2A);
    static_assert(il.begin()[1] == 030);
}
}}
